name: Content - Live Preview
description: Grants read access to all pages and posts. Used for Live Preview so you can preview draft content. Be careful not to expose tokens of users with this policy.

name: Team - App Access
description: Grants Directus Studio access to team members

name: Content - Manage
description: Grants ability to read and edit ALL content.

name: Content - Self
description: Grants user ability to ONLY edit their own content. Cannot publish content.

name: Content - Public
description: Grants ability to read ALL public (published) content.

name: Forms - Submission
description: Grants ability to create form submissions. Used in frontend.
